title: The Best of RISK! Music #16
description:
Our sixteenth collection of our favorite music from the most recent RISK! episodes.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Powers, Andra Day, Diana Ross, Neil Finn, The Heavy, Genesis, Blondage, Chaka Khan, Echo in the Canyon, Love Lake, Fiona Apple, The Black Keys, JR JR, Jakob Dylan, Lizzo, Courtney Marie Andrews, Thea Gilmore, Faces, Current Swell, Hatchie, Broken Social Scene, Passion Pit, Boy George, Sneaker Pimps, Erin McKeown)
